overview: Dr. Hossein Fakhrai-Rad is the co-founder and CEO of Genophen Inc. He has over a decade of extensive scientific and management experience in the fields of Molecular Biology, Genetics, Genomics, and Personalized Medicine. Prior to Genophen, Dr. Rad worked at Affymetrix Inc. where he built and led the genotyping and discovery service department at the company. Prior to Affymetrix, he worked at ParAllele Bioscience as a founding member where he was in charge of high throughput development of 2 main technologies, Molecular Inversion Probe (MIP) and Mismatch Repair Detection (MRD). ParAllele Bioscience was founded in 2001 and then acquired by Affymetrix for $120M in 2005.
